commitMessage:
@@@CALCITE-3187: Make decimal type inference overridable (Praveen Kumar)

Decimal return type inference for addition and modulus is hardcoded.

Add new methods to RelDataTypeSystem to allow implementers to override
behavior if needed. Deprecate existing methods for multiply and divide
in RelDataTypeFactory and move them over to RelDataTypeSystem for
consistency.

Close apache/calcite#1311
@@@[CALCITE-3559] Update formatting: remove "// End" trailers.  move @Test from their own lines

@@@[CALCITE-3892] Make junit test classes and methods non-public where possible

Prior to junit 5.  classes and methods had to be public. This is no
longer the case.

Some classes need to remain public because they are referenced from
elsewhere.  or if they use reflection somehow. The remaining 'public'
keyword will be informative to maintainers.
